title: what is a recommended champion for beginners?.
body:
i'm pretty new at league of legends and i was wondering what is the recommended champion for newbies like me. 
i have got 2 champions to decide on so it can help me through league of legends.

replies.body: I would suggest 450 IP Champions. They're easy to get and easy to learn.
for a new player I'd recommend simply buying all the 450 ip champions and giving them all a shot, then once you've found your play style work up through the price range.

Varus and Shyvana are pretty expensive to buy, unless your willing to buy RP and get them (don't). Otherwise just go through each of the 450 ip champs and see what playstyle you enjoy the most. Will it be playing mages like annie, or marksmans like Ashe, or assassins such as Master Yi.
Yeah 450 ip champs your best bet
